On Sep 20, 2009, at 8:42 PM, wahbedahbe wrote:

> Huh?
> So now it's "HEADERS as the engine of application state"? ;-)
>

Headers are part of a representation.

(That is not to say that Link headers are equivalent to links in the  
body of representation with a well-defined media type.)

Subbu
